title: How to Make a Gluten Free Chiffon Cake

steps.headline: Whisk together the flour mix, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a mixing bowl.
steps.description: Whisking is a very important part of the process, so be sure to do it well.

steps.headline: Make a well in the center and add the oil, unbeaten egg yolks, orange juice, and rind.
Beat on low speed until blended.
Turn the mixer to high and beat 5 minutes.
Beat the egg whites and the cream of tartar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until they form very stiff peaks.
Pour the batter mixture gradually over the whipped whites, gently folding with a rubber spatula until just blended.
Pour the batter into a large tube pan or a 9″ x 13″ oblong cake pan.
Bake the tube pan for 65 minutes or the oblong pan for 45-50 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC.  Whisk together the flour mix, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a mixing bowl. Whisking is a very important part of the process, so be sure to do it well. Make a well in the center and add the oil, unbeaten egg yolks, orange juice, and rind.  Beat on low speed until blended.  Turn the mixer to high and beat 5 minutes.  Beat the egg whites and the cream of tartar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until they form very stiff peaks.  Pour the batter mixture gradually over the whipped whites, gently folding with a rubber spatula until just blended.  Pour the batter into a large tube pan or a 9″ x 13″ oblong cake pan.  Bake the tube pan for 65 minutes or the oblong pan for 45-50 minutes.  Finished.
